title: Hierarchical Leadership Development Program: Real-Time Heuristic Learning-Based Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Leadership experience within organizations and intermediate or higher management competencies
context.additional_context: Leadership Skill Development Program Through Real-Time Learning Simulations Linked to Workplace Scenarios for Office Workers. Team-Based Scenario Execution in VR Environments Using Personal Devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can perform mid-to-senior-level leadership roles in a simulation environment with over 80% accuracy
Participants develop leadership action plans based on multi-source feedback (peers/supervisors/system) and submit at least three improvement implementation reports
In team projects, learners identify and apply at least two heuristic strategies for optimizing organizational learning
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
